page.shortlink: form layout custom item properties properties
page.description: Settings for configuring a Custom Data Bound field on the FormView's layout.

description.p: Specify a class name for the 'control wrapper'. If this value is blank, the value specified in the 'Form Properties' tab for the 'Item class name' will be used. If you do not want to use any value you can specify <None>.
The *[ui:Item type]* property defines the custom databound item for the field. Custom databound items are defined on the *[ui:Items]* tab of the FormView Builder.
